name: Women in Tech December - The Nott Tech Christmas Party!

description.html:
**Seasons Celebrations**

We’re coming together online alongside the Tech Nottingham monthly meetup to celebrate the community and this year we’re very excited to be working with our favorite meetups! You can expect quizzes, games, prizes and of course lots of fun and festive cheer.

Teams of four will be playing for a chance of winning the top prize, you can join as a ready made team or sign up on the night and we’ll team you up. Expect games that are more luck than skill and puns that have more cheese than a boxing day buffet.

As usual, Christmas jumpers/hats/outfits encouraged!

**Win Free Stuff At WiT Notts!**
We’ll be giving away some awesome prizes to our lucky attendees. Details on how to win will be shared during the event.

**Join in with the Nottingham Tech Community online**

The conversation continues online in the Tech Nottingham Slack group, which is a bustling, friendly online community with a channel for (almost) everything you can think of from #pets-corner to #devcorner, #podcasts to #design and everything in between. We'd love to see you there! http://www.technottingham.com/slack

**Thanks to our sponsors**
Capital One, Commify, London Stock Exchange Group and MHR

**For all the details, check our website**
https://www.technottingham.com/events/nott-tech-party-2021
